Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tickets.model.tickets

Class AbstractCategory

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tickets.model.tickets.AbstractCategory
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActiveTicketList, Category
public abstract class AbstractCategory extends Object
Abstract class inherited by the category and active ticket list classes. This class records its category name, how many tickets have been completed, and a list of tickets of the category. Provides functionality to add, remove, and complete tickets in the category.
Author:
ianbrain

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractCategory

      public AbstractCategory(String categoryName, int completedCount)
      Constructs a new category object using its name and count of tickets completed. Throws exception if the name is null or empty or if the count is less than 0.
      Parameters:
      categoryName - name of category to set
      completedCount - count of tickets completed in the category
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or empty or if the count is less than 0

    • removeTicket

      public Ticket removeTicket(int idx)
      Removes the ticket at the specified index and returns that ticket. Throws exception if the index is not within the size of the list.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of the ticket to remove
      Returns:
      the ticket that was removed
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is not within the size of the list

    • getTicket

      public Ticket getTicket(int idx)
      Retrieves a ticket from the given index and returns it. Throw exception if the index is not within the size of the list.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of ticket to retrieve from the category
      Returns:
      the ticket at the specified index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is not within the size of the list

    • completeTicket

      public void completeTicket(Ticket t)
      Completes the ticket parameter and increments the count of completed tickets. Uses "==" as we want to remove the same ticket object from the list.
      Parameters:
      t - ticket to complete

    • getTicketsAsArray

      public abstract String[][] getTicketsAsArray()
